name: confluence
description: Confluence integration plugin for Claude Code - zero dependencies, direct API calls based on OpenAPI spec. Create, view, search, and manage Confluence pages with no MCP or external libraries required.

setup.instructions:
To use this plugin, you need to configure your Confluence credentials:

1. Get your Confluence API token from https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens
2. Add the following to your .claude/settings.json:

{
  "env": {
    "CONFLUENCE_HOST": "your-domain.atlassian.net",
    "CONFLUENCE_EMAIL": "your-email@example.com",
    "CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN": "your-api-token"
  }
}

3. Restart Claude Code

Available commands:
- /confluence-create-page - Create a new page
- /confluence-get-page - View page details
- /confluence-search-pages - Search pages
- /confluence-list-spaces - List all spaces
- /confluence-update-page - Update a page
- /confluence-delete-page - Delete a page
